thread.title: NFL free agency: Odds on teams for Tony Romo, Le'Veon Bell, more
thread.title_full: NFL free agency: Odds on teams for Tony Romo, Le'Veon Bell, more

author: Tadd Haislop (thaislop@sportingnews.com)
title: NFL free agency: Odds on teams for Tony Romo, Le'Veon Bell, more
text:
February 14, 2017 4:00pm EST February 14, 2017 4:00pm EST Where will Kirk Cousins, Tony Romo, Le'Veon Bell, Alshon Jeffery and Eric Berry land in free agency? Here are the odds for each. Tony Romo, Le'Veon Bell (Getty Images) 
Updated at 4 p.m. ET 
Updated at 4 p.m. ET 
If betting is included in your list of reasons to care where key 2017 NFL free agents land, you've come to the right place. If not, well ... oddsmakers rarely whiff, so conclusions can be drawn regardless. 
By the time NFL free agency begins on March 9, several of this year's top free agents might already be locked up via the franchise tag . Good thing BookMaker.eu, which has opened prop odds on landing places for five of the top free agents in 2017, took that into account. 
MORE: Top free agents | Tag candidates 
Washington quarterback Kirk Cousins, Dallas quarterback Tony Romo, Pittsburgh running back Le'Veon Bell, Chicago wide receiver Alshon Jeffery and Kansas City safety Eric Berry form the lucky five. 
Those guys are about to get richer in free agency, with Romo being a unique exception . Leave it to oddsmakers to give the public a chance to get richer in free agency, too. 
Here are the odds on the landing places for all five players, via BookMaker. Odds on Kirk Cousins' team in Week 1 of 2017 
Washington Redskins -200
